title: Update: She's Afraid The Blind Date She's Going On Is A Trap!
description:
A woman reaches out to you interested in hooking you up with a guy. But then she mentions the guy is her ex-boyfriend! After seeing pictures of him, would you take her up on her offer?
In our listener's case, she thinks it's the universe giving her a sign. But we don't think this date is going to be a good idea.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Pionaire Podcasting
